name: Medicinsk ilt.
dosage:
Bevidstløse uden vejrtrækning: Manuel ventilation med 15 liter per minut.(A.1)
Bevidstløse med vejrtrækning: Maske (A.13) med 9 liter/min. Øvrige tilstande: Maske (A.13)med 1 til 9 liter/min.
effect: Tilfører ilt til cellerne via de røde blodlegemer.
sideEffects: Ilt er ufarligt til medicinsk brug.
validity:
Flaske: 3 år fra produktionsdato (Conoxia® , Linde Gas
Therapeutics AGA)
storage: Holdes væk fra antændelige gasser og åben ild. Flasker holdes under 50˚C.
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Medical oxygen.
dosage:
Unconscious without breathing: Manual ventilation, 15 litres per minute.  (A.1)
Unconscious with breathing: Oxygen mask (A.13), 9 litres per minute.
Other states: Oxygen mask (A.13), 1 to 9 litres per minute.
effect: Introduces oxygen to the cells via the red blood cells.
sideEffects: Oxygen is not dangerous when used for medical purposes.
validity:
Bottles 3 years from productions date (Conoxia® , Linde Gas)
Therapeutics AGA)
storage: Keep away from flammable gases and substances. Keep bottle under 50°C
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Lidocain.
dosage: Mængden afhænger af sårets størrelse. Normalt anvendes 20 - 50 mg. Maksimaldosis er 20 ml svarende til 200 mg. Se Lægebog autoriseret af Søfartsstyrelsen.
effect: Lokalbedøver på injektionsstedet. Virker efter 1-2 minutter. Virker 2-3 timer.
sideEffects:
Allergi er sjælden.
Ved utilsigtet injektion i blodbanen kan der opstå:
1.  føleforstyrrelser, svimmelhed, uklarhed og øresusen,
2.  synsforstyrrelser, muskelrysten og kramper,
3.  blodtryksfald og langsom puls.
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato (Xylocain®, AstraZeneca).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Lokalbedøvelse skal ske i et rum med adgang til adrenalin
(4.1) og genoplivningsudstyr (A.1).
Risiko for alvorlige bivirkninger, hvis lidocain injiceres i blodbanen.

name: Lidocain.
dosage:
The amount depends on the size of the wound. Normally, 20-50 mg is used.
The maximum dose is 20 ml, equivalent to 200 mg. See  Medical Manual authorized by the Danish Maritime Authority.
form: Injection liquid, 10 mg/ml for subcutaneous injection.
effect: Anaesthetises the place of injection. Takes effect after 1-2 minutes. Effective for 2-3 hours.
sideEffects:
Allergy seldom occurs.
In case of an unintended injection into the bloodstream, the following side-effects may occur:
1.  affective disturbances, dizziness, confusion, and buzzing in the ears,
2.  visual disturbances, muscle contractions, and
convulsions,
3.  falling blood pressure and slow pulse.
validity: 3 years from the date of production (Xylocain®, AstraZeneca).
storage: Normal temperature. Not to be frozen.
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Local anaesthetics must be administered in a room with access to Epinephrine (4.1) and resuscitation equipment (A.1). Risk of serious side-effects if lidocaine is injected directly into the bloodstream.

name: Lidocain.
dosage:
Anvendes som lokalbedøvelse ved smertende sår eller smertefulde procedurer, fx ved rengøring af brandsår eller større og forurenede sår.
Et tykt lag gel påsmøres huden, der herefter afdækkes lufttæt i ca. 15 minutter.
Virker efter ca. 15 minutter. Virker i ca. 30 minutter.
sideEffects: Allergi er sjælden.
validity: 2 år fra produktionsdato (Xylocain®, AstraZeneca).
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical

name: Lidocaine.
dosage: To be used as local  anaesthetics in case of painful wounds or procedures, e.g. cleansing of burns or large, dirty wounds. A thick layer is applied to the skin, which is subsequently covered in an air-proof condition for about 15 minutes. Takes effect after about 15 minutes. Effective for about 30 minutes.
effect: Anaesthetises the skin and the edges of wounds. Relieves itching.
sideEffects: Allergy seldom occurs.
validity: 2 years from the date of production (Xylocain®, AstraZeneca).
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Paracetamol.
dosage:
Voksne: 1g 3-4 gange dagligt.
Højst 4 g per døgn.
sideEffects: Doser over 15 - 20 g indebærer risiko for leverskade, leversvigt og død.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Pamol Nycomed  DK ApS)
remarks: Ingen.

name: Paracetamol.
dosage: Adults: 1 g three-four times daily. Not more than 4g daily.
sideEffects: Doses of more than 15-20 g involves liver damage, liver failure, and death.
validity:
5 years from the date of production
(Pamol Nycomed  DK ApS ).
remarks: None

name: Ibuprofen.
dosage:
Voksne: 400 mg3-4 gange dagligt. Højst 1800 mg per døgn.
Undtagelsesvist op til 2400 mg per døgn i kortere perioder (4- 6 uger).
sideEffects: Ondt i maven.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Ibumetin®, Nycomed Danmark).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical
Bør ikke anvendes ved:
1.  allergi for acetylsalicylsyre,
2.  astmapatienter,
3.  patienter i blodfortyndende behandling,
4.  patienter med symptomer på mavesår.

name: Ibuprofen.
dosage: Adults: 400 mg three-four times daily. Not more than 1800 mg daily. Exceptionally, up to 2400 mg daily for shorter periods of time (4-6 weeks).
sideEffects: Stomach ache.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Ibumetin®, Nycomed Danmark).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical
Not to be used in case of:
1.  allergy to acetylsalicylic acid,
2.  asthma patients,
3.  patients in blood diluting treatment,
4.  patients with symptoms of ulcer.

name: Morfin  ∆
dosage:
Subcutant og intramuskulært (voksne). 10 mg. Kan gentages, hvis tilstrækkelig effekt udebliver.
Intravenøst (voksne): 5 mg (halv ampul) injiceres langsomt. Kan gentages, hvis tilstrækkelig effekt udebliver.
effect:
Smertestillende. Vækker velvære, virker afslappende.
Virker efter 5 – 15 min ved intramuskulær (i.m.) eller subcutan
(sc.) injektion.
Virker omgående ved intravenøs (i.v.) injektion. Virkningsvarighed: 3 -4 timer
sideEffects:
Svækker vejrtrækningen. 
Kvalme og opkastning.
Hæmmer optagelsen af medikamenter fra mavesækken.
Kan give forstoppelse og hæmme blæretømningen.
validity: 2 år fra produktionsdato, (Morfin, Skanderborg apotek)
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Ved overdosering kan vejrtrækningen ophøre. Modgift: Naloxone (5.1)
Denne bivirkning og morfins virkning i øvrigt forstærkes af andre beroligende stoffer som alkohol, sovemidler og lignende. Overdosering er især en risiko ved hurtig injektion. Overdosering sker sjældent ved almindelig dosering. Oberserver vejrtrækningen og ventiler om nødvendigt med ilt (1.1) på ventilationspose og maske (A.1)

name: Morphine Δ
dosage:
Subcutaneously and intramuscularly (adults): 10 mg. May be repeated if the effect is not sufficient.
Intravenously (adults): 5 mg (1/2 ampoule) to be injected slowly. May be repeated if the effect is not sufficient.
form: Injection liquid, 10 mg/ml, ampoules of 1 ml.
effect:
Pain relieving. Gives the patient a feeling of well-being, relaxant. Takes effect after about 5-15 minutes in case of intramuscular or subcutaneous injection.
Takes effect immediately in case of intravenous injection. Effective for 3-4 hours.
sideEffects:
Restricts breathing. Nausea and vomiting.
Restricts the absorption of medicaments from the stomach. May cause constipation and restrict bladder emptying.
validity: 2 years from the date of production (Morphine, Skanderborg Pharmacy)
storage: Normal temperature. To be protected from light.
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical
In case of an overdose, the patient may stop breathing. Antidote: Naloxone (5.1)
This side-effect and the effect of morphine as drowsiness may be increased by the use of other sedatives, such as alcohol, sleeping medicine, ect.. Risk of overdose primarily if the injection is given too quickly. Overdoses are rare in case of normal dosage.
Observe the breathing and if necessary, ventilate by means of oxygen (1.1) ventilations bag and mask (A.1).

name: Tramadol  ∆
dosage: 100 – 200 mg dagligt
sideEffects: Kvalme, svimmelhed, mundtørhed, opkastning, obstipation. Hovedpine, døsighed, træthed. Øget svedtendens.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato, (Tadol,  PharmaCoDane ApS)
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical. Bør ikke anvendes til gravide.

name: Tramadol ∆
dosage: 100-200 mg daily
sideEffects: Dizziness, nausea, vomiting, constipation, dry mouth, head ache, drowsiness, fatigue, increased sweating.
validity: 5 years from the date of production ( Tadol, PharmaCoDane ApS)
remarks:
Consult Radio Medial.
Should not be used in case of pregnancy.

name: Diclofenac.
dosage: Smøres på huden i et tyndt lag 3-4 gange i døgnet.
sideEffects: Rødme, hududslæt, hudkløe, eksem, hududslæt ved kontakt med midlet.
validity: 3 år, fra produktionsdato (Voltaren®gel, Novatis Healthcare A/S)
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Må kun anvendes på intakt hud.
Må ikke anvendes i ansigtet

name: Diclofenac
dosage: Apply a thin layer to the skin 3-4 times daily
sideEffects: Redness, rash, itching, eczema, skin rashes when in contact with the product.
validity: 3 years from the date of production (Voltaren®gel, Novatis Healthcare A/S)
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Only to be used on intact skin. May not be used in the face.

name: Diclofenac
dosage: 50 -100 mg mg x 1 dagligt
sideEffects:
Nedsat appetit, sure opstød og halsbrand, kvalme, opkastning, mavesmerter, diarré, luft i maven. Hovedpine, svimmelhed.
Hududslæt og hudkløe.
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato, (Voltaren, 2care4)
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Bør ikke anvendes ved:
1.  allergi for acetylsalicylsyre,
2.  astmapatienter,
3.  patienter i blodfortyndende behandling,
4.  patienter med symptomer på mavesår.

name: Diclofenac
dosage: 50 - 100 mg ones daily
sideEffects:
Loss of appetite, heartburn and acid regurgitation, nausea and vomiting,
abdominal pain, diarrhea, flatulence, headache, dizziness, skin rash, itchy skin.
validity: 3 years from the date of production (Voltaren,2care4)
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Not to be used in case of:
1.  allergy to acetylsalicylic acid,
2.  asthma patients,
3.  patients in blood diluting treatment,
4.  patients with symptoms of ulcer.

name: Adrenalin.
dosage:
Omgående (voksne): 0,6 mg (godt en halv ampul) dybt intramuskulært.
Kan eventuelt gentages, hvis virkningen udebliver.
form: Injektionsvæske 1 mg/ml, ampullerà1 ml til intramuskulær injektion.
effect:
Øger pulsen, hjertets pumpekraft og blodtrykket. Sammenækning af blodkar.
Virker 2-5 minutter efter intramuskulær injektion. Omsættes meget hurtigt. Halveringstiden i blodet er 2-3 minutter.
groupName: Midler mod allergi, shock og søsyge /                                                                             Agents for Allergy, Shock and Seasickness
sideEffects: Blodtryksstigning, hurtig puls, rysten og svimmelhed.
validity:
2 år fra produktionsdato (Adrenalin®, DAK), Hvis opbevaret ved 2-8˚C.
6 måneder fra produktionsdato (Adrenalin®, DAK), hvis opbevaret under 25˚C
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Er livsfarligt at anvende ved shock forårsaget af blod- eller væsketab.

name: Adrenaline.
dosage:
Immediately (adults): 0.6 mg (about half an ampoule) given deep intramuscular.
May be repeated if the effect is insufficient
form: Injection liquid, 1 mg/ml, ampoules of 1 ml for intramuscular injection.
effect:
Increases the pulse, the pumping power of the heart, and the blood pressure. Contraction of blood vessels.
Takes effect 2-5 minutes after intramuscular injection. Transformed very quickly. The halving time in the blood is 2-3 minutes.
groupName: Midler mod allergi, shock og søsyge /                                                                             Agents for Allergy, Shock and Seasickness
sideEffects: High blood pressure, rapid pulse, shivering, and dizziness.
validity:
2 years from the date of production (Adrenalin®, DAK),, if stored at 2 °C-8 °C or
6 months if stored less than 25 °C
storage: To be stored in a cool and dark place.
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Potentialy fatal if used to treat chock caused by loss of blood or fluid.

name: Acrivastin.
dosage: Voksne: 8 mg efter behov. Maksimalt 3 gange per døgn.
effect:
Modvirker allergiske reaktioner.
Maksimal virkning efter 11/2  - 2 timer. Virkningsvarighed op til 8 timer.
groupName: Midler mod allergi, shock og søsyge /                                                                             Agents for Allergy, Shock and Seasickness
sideEffects: Døsighed kan forekomme og forstærkes af alkohol og beroligende midler, herunder sovemidler.
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato (Benadryl®, McNeil ApS).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Lægemidlet er ikke mærket med Δ men enkelte personer sløves alligevel så meget, at det er uforsvarligt med vagttjeneste eller maskinbetjening.
Ved lungesymptomer: Se tillige gruppe 15.

name: Acrivastine.
dosage: Adults: 8 mg when required. Maximum three times daily.
effect: Eases allergic symptoms. Maximum effect after 1.5-2 hours. Effective for up to 8 hours.
groupName: Midler mod allergi, shock og søsyge /                                                                             Agents for Allergy, Shock and Seasickness
sideEffects: Drowsiness may occur and is increased by the use of alcohol and sedatives, including sleeping medicine.
validity: 3 years from the date of production (Benadryl®, McNeil Denmark ApS).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
The medicament is not marked with a Δ, but some patients experience a high degree of drowsiness , making bridge duty and operations of machinery unsafe. In case of symptoms of from the lungs: See group 15.

name: Hydrocortison
dosage: Voksne: 100 mg intramuskulært eller intravenøst som éngangsdosis.
form: Injektionssubstans 100 mg i to-delt hætteglas med 2 ml sterilt vand til intramuskulært eller intravenøst brug.
effect:
Modvirker allergi og inflammationer.
Virkningen indtræder først4-6 timer efter injektion, hvorfor anden akut behandling skal dække dette tidsrum.
groupName: Midler mod allergi, shock og søsyge /                                                                             Agents for Allergy, Shock and Seasickness
sideEffects:
Ved længere tids anvendelse:
Forstyrrelser sukker, vand- og saltstofskiftet og i kirtlernes funktion. Sløring og/eller aktivering af infektioner. Eufori, sindsyge og søvnløshed. Ondt i maven og mavesår.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Solu-Cortef ®, Pfizer ApS). Brugsfærdig injektionsvæske holdbart i 72 timer, hvis opbevaret kold.ti køleskab.
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Ved lungesymptomer: Se tillige gruppe 15.

name: Hydrocortisonsuccinate
dosage: Adults: 100 mg given intramuscularly or intravenously as a single dose.
form: Injection substance, 100 mg in capped vial divided into two sections, with 2 ml sterile water for intramuscular or intravenous use.
effect:
Eases symptoms of allergy and inflammations.
Does not take effect until 4-6 hours after the injection.
Other acute treatment to cover this period is needed.
groupName: Midler mod allergi, shock og søsyge /                                                                             Agents for Allergy, Shock and Seasickness
sideEffects:
If used for an extended period:
Disturbances in the sugar, water and salt metabolism and in the glandula functions. Masking  and/or activation of infections. Euphoria, mental ilness and insomnia. Stomache ache and ulcer.
validity:
5 years from the date of production (Solu-Cortef®, Pfizer ApS).
Injection liquid ready for use, valid for 72 hours, if stored cold.
storage: Normal temperature. To be kept out of daylight. Injection liquid ready for use, to be stored refrigeated.
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
In case of symptoms from lungs  See also group
15.

name: Cinnarizin   ∆
dosage: 25 mg en ½ time før effekt ønskes. Efter behov kan derefter tages 12,5 mg hver 6. time.
groupName: Midler mod allergi, shock og søsyge /                                                                             Agents for Allergy, Shock and Seasickness
sideEffects: Døsighed
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Sepan®, Paranova Danmark A/S).
remarks: Må ikke gives til patienter med grøn stær eller vandladningsbesvær .

name: Cinnarizine Δ
dosage: 25 mg ½hour before desired effect. If needed, 12,5 mg may be given subsequently every 6 hours.
groupName: Midler mod allergi, shock og søsyge /                                                                             Agents for Allergy, Shock and Seasickness
sideEffects: Drowsiness.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Sepan®, Paranova Danmark A/S)
remarks: Do not administer to patients with glaucoma or urinating problems (enlarged prostate)

name: Prednisolon
dosage: Efter ordination af Radio Medical Danmark
groupName: Midler mod allergi, shock og søsyge /                                                                             Agents for Allergy, Shock and Seasickness
sideEffects: Forhøjet tryk i øjet, slører infektion.  Infektion
validity: 2 år fra produktions dato (Prednisolon, Actavis)
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Prenisolon
dosage: After precipstion from Radio Medical
groupName: Midler mod allergi, shock og søsyge /                                                                             Agents for Allergy, Shock and Seasickness
sideEffects: Glaucoma,  blurs infections, infektions
validity: 2 years from production date ( Prednisolon, Actavis)
remarks: Consult Radio Medical Denmark

name: Naloxon.
dosage:
1.  Naloxon voksne: Der gives omgående 0,8 mg (2 ampuller) intramuskulært.
2.  Hvis virkningen udebliver kan behandlingen gentages efter 5 minutter.
form: Injektionsvæske 0,4 mg/ml, ampuller à 1 ml til intramuskulær injektion.
effect:
Naloxon ophæver morfins (bi)virkning.
Virker2-3 minutter efter intramuskulær injektion. Virkningsvarighed: Op til 4 timer.
sideEffects: Rysten, utilpashed og opkastninger (abstinenssymptomer).
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato (Naloxon, B. Braun).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Morfin kan forringe eller ophæve vejrtrækningen. Bivirkningen er sjælden og optræder sædvanligvis kun ved meget store overdoser og hyppigst i forbindelse med en hurtig indgivelse i venerne.

name: Naloxone.
dosage:
1.  Naloxone adults: 0.8 mg (2 ampoules) is given immedi- ately intramuscular.
2.  In case of no effect, the treatment may be repeated after 5 minutes.
form: Injection liquid, 0.4 mg/ml, ampoules of 1 ml for intramuscular injection.
effect: Naloxone counteracts the (side)-effects of morphine. Takes effect 2-3 minutes after intramuscular injection. Effective for up to 4 hours.
sideEffects: Shivering, general indisposition, and vomiting.
validity: 3 years from the date of production (Naloxon B. Braun).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Morphine may reduce or stop the patient’’s breathing. This side-effect is rare and, usually occers in case of a  large overdose and/or quick intravenous injection..

name: Glucagon.
dosage:
Voksne: 1 mg intramuskulært. Kan evt. gentages efter 10 -15 minutter.
Når patienten er kommet til bevidsthed gives brød og sød saft.
form:
Ready-set bestående af:
Injektionssubstans Glucagon 1 mg i hætteglas og sprøjte med 1 ml sterilt vand til intramuskulært brug.
effect:
Frigør sukkerreserver fra leveren.
Virker normalt inden5- 10 minutter. Virkningsvarighed: 10 - 40 minutter.
sideEffects:
Kvalme og opkastninger kan forekomme.
Kan udløse hjertekrampe hos hjertesyge. Hjertekrampe behandles med glycerylnitrat spray (9.1).
validity:
Holdbarhed: Ved almindelig temperatur: 18 måneder fra produktionsdato
(GlucaGen® HypoKit, Novo Nordisk).
Ved 2 - 8°C: 36 måneder fra produktionsdato.
Den blandede opløsning skal anvendes umiddelbart.
storage: Almindelig temperatur eller 2 - 8°C. (GlucaGen® HypoKit, Novo Nordisk).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Dersom den blandede opløsning er uklar eller med krystaller, må blandingen ikke anvendes.

name: Glucagon.
dosage:
Adults: 1 mg intramuscularly. May be repeated after 10-15 minutes.
When the patient regains consciousness, he is given some bread and sweet juice.
form:
Ready-set consisting of:
Injection substance Glucagon, 1 mg in a capped vial and a syringe with 1 ml of sterile water for intramuscular use.
effect: Releases sugar reserves from the liver. Normally, takes effect within 5-10 minutes. Effective for 10-40 minutes.
sideEffects:
Nausea and vomiting may occur.
May cause angina pectoris in people with heart diseases. Angina pectoris is treated with glyceryl trinitrate spray (9.1).
validity:
At room temperature: 18 months from the date of production
(GlucaGen® HypoKit, Novo Nordisk).
At 2-8°C: 36 months from the date of production. The mixed dissolution must be used immediately.
storage: Normal temperature or 2-8°C. (GlucaGen® HypoKit, Novo Nordisk).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
If the mixed dissolution is cloudy or contains crystals, it must not be used.

name: Atropin.
dosage:
Dosis afhænger af forgiftningen. Atropin indgives langsomt intravenøst.
Der startes med 2 mg (2 ampuller) og fortsættes med yderligere 2 mg efter hver 5 - 10 minutters mellemrum indtil pupillerne begynder at udvide sig.
Giftig dosis er 10 - 20 mg til voksne. Dødelig dosis er ca. 200 mg til voksne.
form: Injektionsvæske 1 mg/ml, ampullerà1 ml til intravenøs injektion.
effect:
Livreddende ved forgiftninger af visse insektgifte.
Virkningen afhænger af gifttype og mængde. Se MFAG tabel 17.
sideEffects: Pupiludvidelse, lysskyhed, tørre slimhinder, hurtig puls, vandladningsbesvær og forstoppelse.
validity: Plastampuller: 2 år fra produktionsdato. (Atropin®, Nycomed Danmark).
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Atropin.
dosage:
The dose depends on the poisoning. Atropin is given slowly intravenously.
At first, 2 mg (2 ampoules) is given, followed by another 2 mg after every 5-10 minutes until the pupils start dialating. Poisonous dose is 10-20 mg for adults.
Lethal dose is about 200 mg for adults.
form: Injection liquid, 1 mg/ml, ampoules of 1 ml for intravenous injection.
effect:
Life-saving in connection with poisonings caused by certain insecticides.
The effect depends on the type and amount of poison. See MFAG table 17.
sideEffects: Dilation of the pupils, photophobia, dry mucous membranes, rapid pulse, dysuria, and constipation.
validity: Plastic ampoules: 2 years from the date of production (Atropin®, Nycomed Danmark)
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Calciumgluconat 2%.
dosage:
Første hjælp: Huden skylles med rigelig vand i mindst 10 minutter. Forurenet tøj fjernes. Huden vaskes med vand og sæbe og skylles.
Huden indsmøres i calciumgluconat gel. Se vejledning i MFAG tabel 8.
form: Tuber à 25 g, indeholdende 2 g calciumgluconat per 100 g. Fremstilles af apoteket..
effect: Calcium neutraliserer i et vist omfang ætsningsskaderne ved fluoridætsninger.
sideEffects: Ingen.
validity: 2 år fra produktionsdato.
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Calciumgluconate 2%.
dosage:
First aid: The skin is rinsed with plenty of water for at least 10 minutes. Contaminated clothes are removed. The skin is washed with water and soap and rinsed.
Calciumgluconate gel is applied to the skin. See guidelines in MFAG table 8.
form: Tubes of 25 g, containing 2 g of calciumgluconate per 100 g. Made by the individual pharmacy.
effect: Calcium neutralizes caustic burns caused by fluorine to some extent.
sideEffects: None.
validity: 2 years from the date of production.
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Calciumlactogluconat og calciumcarbonat.
dosage: Ordination af Radio Medical
effect: Neutraliserer i et vist omfang skader efter optagelse af fluorsalte og fluorid forbindelser gennem huden.
sideEffects: Normalt ingen bivirkninger
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato (Calcium-Sandoz®, Novartis).
storage: Er fugtfølsomt. Opbevares tørt i tæt emballage ved almindelig temperatur.
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Calciumlactogluconate and calciumcarbonate.
dosage: Contact Radio Medical
effect: Neutralizes injuries caused by the absorption of fluoride compounds through the skin to some extent.
sideEffects: No side effects
validity: 3 years from the date of production (Calcium-Sandoz, Orifarm).
storage: Sensitive to humidity. To be stored in a dry place in a sealed packaging at room temperature.
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Aktivt kul.
dosage:
50 - 100 g kul (1 - 2 flasker) opslemmet i vand indtages så hurtigt som muligt.
Ved alvorlige forgiftninger fortsættes med 20 g (160 ml) hver 6. time.
Se også MFAG, Appendix 14.
form: 50 g aktivt kul i granulatform til opblanding i 400 ml vand.
effect: Opsuger gift og lægemidler fra mavetarmkanalen og binder stofferne til kulpartiklerne i tarmene.
sideEffects: Farver afføringen sort. Kan give forstoppelse. Nedsætter virkningen af lægemidler, der er indtaget via munden.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Carbomix Norit®). Efter opblanding i vand: Maks. 3 dage i køleskab.
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical. Anvendes ikke til bevidstløse.
Må ikke anvendes ved indtagelse af stærke syrer/baser eller organiske opløsningsmidler (petroleumslignende).

name: Active carbon.
dosage:
50-100 g carbon (1-2 bottles) suspended in water is taken as quickly as possible.
In case of serious poisonings, continue with 20 g (160 ml) every sixth hour.
See also MFAG, Appendix 14.
form: 50 g of active carbon in the form of granulate for dilution in 400 ml of water.
effect: Absorbs poison and medicaments from the gastrointestinal tract and binds the substances to the carbon particles in the intestines.
sideEffects:
Black faeces. May cause constipation.
Reduces the effect of medicaments taken through the mouth.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Carbomix Norit®). After having been mixed with water, maximum 3 days in the fridge.
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Do not use on unconscious patients.
Not to be used in connection with strong acids/bases or organic solvents (kerosene related).

name: Ethyl alkohol 99,5%     (alternativt 99,9%).
dosage: 25 ml opblandes i 250 – 300 ml vand eller saft. Dosis gentages hver 3 time indtil evakuering. Se MFAG tabel 19.
effect: Modgift mod methanol og ethylenglucols virkning.
sideEffects: Kvalme, hovedpine.
validity: 2 år fra produktionsdato.
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Ethyl alcohol 99,5% (alternative 99,9%)
dosage:
25 ml is mixed with 250-300 ml water or juice. Repeat every 3 hours until evacuation.
See MFAG table 19.
effect: Antidote against the effect of methanole and ethylene glucole
sideEffects: Nausea, vomiting and headache.
validity: 2 years from the date of production.
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Phytomenadion (K-vitamin).
dosage:
Se MFAG tabel 14.
Sædvanlig dosis: 10 - 20 mg dagligt.
form: Injektionsvæske 10 mg/ml, ampuller à 1 ml til intramuskulær injektion.
effect:
Modvirker giftarter, der medfører forstyrrelser i blodets evne til at størkne.
Maksimal virkning 2 timer efter injektion.
sideEffects: Udvidelse af blodkarrene, blodtryksfald, åndenød, kollaps.
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato (Konakion® Novum, Roche).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Stoffet må ikke anvendes, hvis væsken er uklar eller har delt sig i faser.

name: Phytomenadione (vitamin K).
dosage:
See MFAG table 14.
Ordinary dose: 10-20 mg daily
form: Injection liquid, 10 mg/ml, ampoules of 1 ml for intramuscular injection.
effect:
Counteracts types of poison causing disturbances in the blood’s ability to coagulate.
Maximum effect 2 hours after injection.
sideEffects: Enlargement of the blood vessels, falling blood pressure, difficulty in breathing, collapse.
validity: 3 years from the date of production (Konakion®, Novum, Roche).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Not to be used if the liquid is cloudy or has divided itself into phases.

name: Diazepam ∆.
dosage:
5 mg x 3 dagligt.
Akut sindsyge: Dosis efter aftale med Radio Medical. Se også 6.4.
effect:
Stærkt sløvende og muskelafslappende. Dæmper angst, uro og rastløshed.
Virker efter 30 minutter.
Udskilles meget langsomt (Halveringstid: 20 - 50 timer). Forstærker virkningen af morfin, haloperidol, alkohol og andre sløvende medikamenter.
groupName: Akut sindsyge og kramper /  Mentel disorder and Convulsions
sideEffects: Vanedannende. Døsighed, svimmelhed, forvirring, hukommelsessvigt og balanceforstyrrelser.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Diazepam, Nycomed Danmark).
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Diazepam  Δ
dosage:
5 mg three times daily
Acute mental disease: Dose after consultation with Radio Medical. See also 6.4.
effect:
Strongly sedative and muscle-relaxant. Decreases anxiety and restlessness.
Takes effect after 30 minutes.
Is excreted very slowly (halving time: 20-50 hours). Increases the effect of morphine, haloperidole, alcohol and other sedatives.
groupName: Akut sindsyge og kramper /  Mentel disorder and Convulsions
sideEffects: Addictive. Drowsiness, dizziness, confusion, lapse of memory, and balance disturbances.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Diazepam, Nycomed Danmark).
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Diazepam.∆
dosage: Efter aftale med Radio Medical - 1 klysma tømmes ind i endetarmen.
form: Klysma, 4 mg/ml, klysma til anvendelse i endetarmen.
effect:
Stærkt sløvende og muskelafslappende. Dæmper angst, uro og rastløshed.
Virker5- 10 minutter efter rektal administration. Udskilles meget langsomt (Halveringstid: 20 - 50 timer). Forstærker virkningen af morfin, haloperidol, alkohol og andre sløvende medikamenter.
groupName: Akut sindsyge og kramper /  Mentel disorder and Convulsions
sideEffects: Døsighed, svimmelhed, forvirring, hukommelsessvigt og balanceforstyrrelser.
validity: 2,5  år fra produktionsdato (Stesolid®, Actavis A/S). Dog maksimalt 1 år efter anbrud af aluminiumsposen.
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Diazepam   Δ .
dosage: After consult of Radio Medical - 1 enema is emptied into the rectum.
form: Enema, 4 mg /ml, enema for insertion into the rectum.
effect:
Strong sedative and muscle-relaxant. Decreases anxiety and restlessness.
Takes effect 5-10 minutes after rectal administration. Is excreted very slowly (halving time: 20-50 hours). Increases the effect of morphine, haloperidole, alcohol and other sedatives.
groupName: Akut sindsyge og kramper /  Mentel disorder and Convulsions
sideEffects: Drowsiness, dizziness, confusion, lapse of memory, and balance disturbances.
validity:
2,5  years from the date of production (Stesolid®, Actavis A/ S).
However, maximum 1 year after having opened the aluminium bag.
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Haloperidol.∆
dosage:
Akut sindsyge: 5- 10 mg intramuskulært. Kan eventuelt gentages 3 eller flere gange dagligt.
Behandlingen kan eventuelt forstærkes med diazepam (6.2/6.3).
form: Injektionsvæske 5 mg/ml, ampuller à 1 ml til intramuskulær injektion.
effect: Afdæmper symptomerne ved sindsygen. Dæmper kvalme og opkastninger.
groupName: Akut sindsyge og kramper /  Mentel disorder and Convulsions
sideEffects:
Agitation, Ufrivillige bevægelser,  Hovedpine, Søvnløshed.    
Den sløvende effekt forstærkes af alkohol, morfin og andre sløvende midler.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Serenase®, Janssen-Cilag).
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Haloperidole.∆
dosage:
Acute mental disease: 5-10 mg intramuscularly. May be repeated three daily or more.
The treatment may be enhanced by the use of diazepam (6.2/6.3).
form: Injection liquid 5 mg/ml, ampoules of 1 ml for intramuscular injection.
effect: Restricts the symptoms of mental disease. Reduces nausea and vomiting.
groupName: Akut sindsyge og kramper /  Mentel disorder and Convulsions
sideEffects: The sedative effect is increased by alcohol, morphine, and other sedatives.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Serenase®, Janssen- Cilag).
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Zolpidem ∆.
dosage: Voksne. 10 mg 15-30 min. før sengetid.
effect:
Stærkt sløvende
Virker hurtigt efter indtagelse
Virkningen varer op til 6 timer
Virkningen forstærkes af andre sløvende stoffer, herunder alkohol.
groupName: Akut sindsyge og kramper /  Mentel disorder and Convulsions
sideEffects:
Kvalme, opkastning, diarré.
Hovedpine, koncentrationsbesvær, konfusion, hukommelsesbesvær, svimmelhed, døsighed, følelsesforfladigelse, hudreaktioner, dobbeltsyn.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato ( Zolpidem Hexal A/S).
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Zolpidem Δ
dosage: Adults. 10 mg 15-30 minutes. before bedtime.
effect:
Strong sedative, rapid effect after ingestion, Effective up till 6 hours.
The effect is increased by the use of other sedatives, including alcohol
groupName: Akut sindsyge og kramper /  Mentel disorder and Convulsions
sideEffects:
Nausea, vomiting, diarrhea.
Headache, difficulty concentrating, confusion, memory loss, dizziness, drowsiness, skin reactions, double vision
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Zolpidem Hexal A/S)
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Phenoxymethylpencillin
dosage: 400 mg– 800 mg×2–4 dagligt
effect: Dræber de hyppigst forekommende bakterier, der forårsager infektioner i luftvejene
sideEffects:
Kvalme, diarré og hududslæt.
Sjældent ses overfølsomhedsshock
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato (Primcillin®, MEDA)
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Overfølsomhedsshock optræder meget sjældent, og som regel senest 30 minutter efter indgift.
Behandling: Adrenalin 0.6 mg intramuskulært (4.1)

name: Phenoxymethylpenicillin.
dosage: 400-800 mg × 2-4 times daily
effect: Kills the most common bacteria causing infections of the respiratory tract.
sideEffects: Vomiting, diarrhoea and rash. Rarely allergic shock.
validity: 3 years from the date of production ( Primcillin®, MEDA)
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Allergic shock is very rare and usually occurs within 30 minutes after administration.
Treatment: Adrenaline 0.6mg intramuscular.(4.1)

name: Amoxicillin.
dosage: 375-750 mg 2 gange daglig.
sideEffects: Feber, kvalme, opkastning, sure opstød, diarré, hudkløe, hududslæt, nældefeber.
validity: 4 år fra produktionsdato (Imadrax, Sandoz A/S).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Overfølsomhedsshock optræder meget sjældent og som regel senest 30 minutter efter indgift. Behandling: Adrenalin 0,6 mg intramuskulært.(4.1)

name: Amoxicilline.
dosage: 375-750 mg twice daily
sideEffects: Fever, nausea, vomiting, heartburn,diarrhoea, rash and urticaria.
validity: 4 years from the date of production (Imadrax, Sandoz A/S).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Allergic shock is very rare and usually it occurs within 30 minutes after administration.
Treatment: Adrenaline 0.6 mg intramuscular (4.1).

name: Erythromycin.
dosage:
250- 500 mgx2-4 dagligt.
Ved alvorlig infektion kan dosis øges til 4 g per døgn. Tabletter gives umiddelbart før måltid.
(Enterotabletter gives senest en time før måltid eller tidligst 2 timer efter).
sideEffects: Madlede, kvalme, mavekneb og forbigående diaré.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Abboticin, Amdipharm Limited).
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Erythromycin.
dosage:
250-500 mg two-four times daily case of a serious infection, the dose may be increased to
4ga day.
Tablets are given immediately before a meal.
(Enterotablets are given 1 hour before a meal at the latest or 2 hours after a meal at the earliest).
sideEffects: Loss of appetite, nausea, stomach cramp, or transient diarrhoea.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Abboticin, Amdipharm Limited).
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Metronidazol.
dosage: 500 mg x 3 dagligt.
sideEffects:
Mavekneb, smagsforstyrrelser, hovedpine, hududslet og svimmelhed. Urinen kan blive farvet mørk.
Kan virke som antabus ved samtidig indtagelse af alkohol.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Metronidazol, Actavis Group hf.).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical. Bør ikke anvendes til gravide.
Anvendes ofte i kombination med andre antibiotika, fx
Ciprofloxacin (7.8) eller Ceftriaxon (7.9)
Må ikke anvendes sammen med 15.1 Dextromethorphan.

name: Metronidazol.
dosage: 500 mg three times daily
sideEffects: Bellyache, altered sense of taste, headache, rash, and dizziness. The urine may be coloured black. May cause a reaction similar to that caused by Antabuse in connection with alcohol.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Metronidazol, Actavis Group hf.).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Should not be given to pregnant patients.
Often used in combination with other antibiotics, e.g. Ciprofloxacin (7.8) or Ceftriaxon (7.9).
May not be used with 15.1 Dextromethorphan

name: Metronidazol.
dosage: 500 mg x 3 daglig
sideEffects: Kvalme, opkastning, mavesmerter, diaré, forstoppelse, og smagsforstyrrelse. Mørkfarvet urin. Kan virke som antabus ved samtidig indtagelse af alkohol.
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato (Flagyl® , Sanofi-aventis Denmark A/S)
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Kan om nødvendigt anvendes, til gravide.
Anvendes ofte i kombination med andre antibiotika, , fx Ciprofloxacin (7.8) eller Ceftriaxon (7.9). Må ikke anvendes sammen med 15.1 Dextromethorphan.

name: Metronidazol.
dosage: 500 mg three times daily
sideEffects:
Nausea vomiting, abdominal pain, diarrhea, constipation, and taste disturbance.
Dark colored urine. May cause a reaction similar to Antabuse in connection with alcohol.
validity: 3 years from productions date (Metronidazol, Actavis)
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
May be used during pregnancy, if nessasary.
Often used in combination with other antibiotic,s  e.g. Ciprofloxacin (7.8) or Ceftriaxon (7.9).
May not be used with 15.1 Dextromethorphan

name: Ciprofloxacin.
dosage:
250 - 750 mg x 2 dagligt.
Tabletterne gives senest en time før måltid eller tidligst 2 timer efter.
sideEffects:
Mavekneb, kvalme, opkastninger, madlede. Hovedpine, svimmelhed, træthed og kramper. Muskel-, led-  og seneømhed.
Allergi. Overfølsomhedsreaktion ved samtidig udsættelse for sollys.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Cifin, PharmaCoDane ApS).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Gives ved mange infektioner i kombination med metronidazol (7.6 eller 7.7).
Må ikke gives til gravide eller ammende.

name: Ciprofloxacine.
dosage: 250-750 mg twice dailyThe tablets are given 1 hour before a meal at the latest or 2 hours after a meal at the earliest.
sideEffects:
Bellyache, nausea, vomiting, loss of appetite. Headache, dizziness, fatigue, and convulsions.
Soreness in the muscles, joints and tendons.
Allergy. Allergic reaction in case of simultaneous exposure to sunlight.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Cifin, PharmaCoDane Aps).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Is given in combination with metronidazole (7.6 or 7.7) in connection with many infections.
Should not be given to pregnant or breast-feeding patients.

name: Ceftriaxon.
dosage: 1-2g intravenøst i døgnet i én dosis.
form:
Injektionssubstans, 1 g tørstof i hætteglas + 10 ml sterilt vand i hætteglas til intravenøst brug.
Kan gives intramuskulært - Kontakt Radio Medical
sideEffects: Allergiske reaktioner: Hududslet, nældefeber, ledsmerter, overfølsomhedsshock.
validity:
Injektionssubstans: 3 år fra produktionsdato (Rocephalin®, Roche).
Brugsfærdig opløsning: 24 timer i køleskab.
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Gives ved mange infektioner i kombination med metronidazol (7.6 eller 7.7).
Er stærkt vævsirriterende ved intramuskulær injektion.

name: Ceftriaxone.
dosage: 1-2 g intravenously dailyas a single dose.
form:
Injection substance,1g of dry matter in a capped vial + 10 ml of sterile water in a capped vial for intravenous use.
Can be given intramuscular - Contact Radio Medical.
sideEffects: Allergic reactions: Rash, urticaria, arthralgia, allergic shock.
validity:
Injection substance: 3 years from the date of production (Rocephaline®, Roche).
Dissolution ready for use: 24 hours, if refrigerated.
storage: Not to be stored at more than 30°C.
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Often used in combination with metronidazole (7.6 or 7.7) in connection with many infections.
In case of intramuscular injection, strong irritation of tissue.

name: Tetanusholdig vaccine (tetanustoxoid).
dosage: Følg ordination fra Radio Medical Danmark eller indlægsseddel
sideEffects:
Lokal rødme, hævelse og ømhed.
Hovedpine, utilpashed og feber ses undertiden og fortager sig efter et døgn.
Ledsmerter og hævede, ømme lymfeknuder kan ses på 8. dag.
validity: 2 år fra produktionsdato (Tetanusvaccine SSI).
storage: Opbevares køligt mellem 2 - 8°C. Frossen vaccine må ikke anvendes.
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Vaccine containing teatnus (tetanustoxoid).
dosage: Follow instruction from Radio Medical Denmark or  the leaflet in packet
sideEffects:
Local blushing, swelling, and soreness.
Headache, weak general condition, and fever are sometimes seen, which decrease after about 1 day.
Arthralgia and swollen, sore lymph nodes may be seen on the eighth day.
validity: 2 years from the date of production (Tetanus vaccine SSI).
storage: To be stored cool at between 2-8°C. Frozen vaccine must not be used.
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Humant tetanus immunglobulin.
dosage: 1 injektion à 250 I.E. (1 ml) intramuskulært. Suppleres med tetanusvaccine (se 7.10).
form: Injektionsvæske 250 I.E. Ampulà1 ml til intramuskulær injektion.
sideEffects: Lokal rødme, hævelse, ømhed og feber ses undertiden.
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato (Tetagam®  P/Tetanogamma®  P, Centeon).
storage:
Opbevares køligt mellem 2 - 8°C.
Frossen immunglobulin må ikke anvendes.
Må ikke anvendes, hvis væsken fremstår uklar eller klumpet.
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Human tetanus immune globulin.
dosage:
1 injection of 250 IU (1 ml) given intramuscularly.
To be supplemented by the tetanus vaccine (see 7.10).
form: Injection liquid 250 IU. Ampoule of 1 ml for intramuscular injection.
effect: Combats poisonous substances produced by the tetanus bacteria.
sideEffects: Local blushing, swollenness, soreness, and fever are sometimes seen.
validity: 3 years from the date of production (Tetagam®  P/ Tetanogamma® P, CSL Behring).
storage:
To be stored cool at between 2-8°C.
Frozen immune globulin must not be used.
Not to be used if the liquid is muddy or lumpy.
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Flucloxacillin
dosage: 750 - 1000 mg 3-4 gange dagligt
sideEffects: Kvalme, opkastning, diarré, hududslæt.
validity: 2 år fra produktionsdato. Åbne blisterpakninger 6 måneder (Heracillin, Meda AS)
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Flucloxacillin
dosage: 750-1000 mg 3-4 times daily
sideEffects: Nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, skin rash
validity: 2 years from the date of production. 6 months for open blister pack(Heracillin, Meda AS)
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Sulfamethoxazol+trimitroprim
dosage: 2 tabletter 2 gange dagligt
sideEffects: Feber. Betændelse på tungen, kvalme, opkastning, mavesmerter, diarré, hudkløe, hududslæt.
validity: 2 år fra produktionsdato. (Sulfamethoxazol+trimitropin, Skanderborg Apotek)
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical. Bør ikke anvendes til gravide.

name: Sulfamethoxazole+trimitroprim
dosage: 2 tablets twice daily
sideEffects: Fever. Inflammation of the tongue, nausea, vomiting, abdominal pain, diarrhea, pruritus, rash.
validity:
2 years from the date of production
(Sulfamethoxazol+trimitropin, Skanderborg Phamacy)
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Should not be used during pregnancy

name: Amoxicillin/clavulansyre
dosage: 500 mg x 3 times daily
sideEffects:
Diarré, mavesmerter, kvalme, opkastning.
Kløe, hududslæt, svamp i munden
validity: 3 år fra produktions dato (Amoxicillin/clavulansyre, COpharma ApS )
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical
Allergisk shock er meget sjældent og forekommer normalt inden for 30 minutter efter administration.
Behandling: Adrenalin 0,6 mg intramuskulær. (4.1)

name: Amoxicillin/clavulanacid
dosage: 500 mg x 3 times daily
sideEffects:
Diarrhea, Abdominal pain, Nausea, Vomiting.
Itching, Skin rash, Fungus in the mouth
validity: 3 years from the date of production (Amoxicillin/clavulansyre, COpharma ApS )
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Allergic shock is very rare and usually occurs within 30 minutes after administration.
Treatment: Adrenaline 0.6mg intramuscular.(4.1)

name: Azithromycin
dosage: Voksne: 500 mg x 1-2 dagligt.
sideEffects: Mavesmerter, kvalme, nedsat appetit,  kraftesløshed, svimmelhed, smagsforstyrrelser, hovedpine, hudkløe og hududslæt.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Azithromycin, KRKA).
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical

name: Azithromycin
dosage: Adults: 500 mg x 1-2 daily
sideEffects: Abdominal pain, nausea, decreased appetite, weakness, dizziness, taste disturbances, headache, itchy skin and skin rash.
validity: 5 years from date of production (Azithromycin, KRKA)
remarks: Consult Radio Medical

name: Atovaquon/Proguanil (Malarone®).
dosage:
Tabletterne skal indtages med fedtholdigt mad (mælk/smør). Forebyggelse fra 1 dag før ankomst til 7 dage efter afrejse fra malariaområdet.
Dosis voksne: 1 tablet dagligt.
sideEffects:
Hovedpine, mavekneb, kvalme, opkastning, appetitløshed, diaré, hoste og allergisk hududslet.
Ved opkastning inden én time efter indtagelse af medikamentet indtages ny tablet.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Malarone®, GlaxoSmithKline Pharma A/S).
remarks:
Forebyggelse: Se Søfartsstyrelsens gældende vejledning om Malaria.
Ved opkastning inden én time efter indtagelse af medikamentet indtages ny tablet.

name: Atovaquone/Proguanil (Malarone®).
dosage: The tablets must be taken with fatty food (milk/butter). The prevention starts 1 day before arrival and lasts until 7 days after departure from the malaria area. Dose, adults: 1 tablet a day.
sideEffects: Headache, stomach pains, nausea, vomiting, loss of appetite, diarrhoea, coughing and allergic rash.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Malarone®, GlaxoSmithKline Pharma A/S).
remarks:
Primary prevention of malaria: See the Danish Maritime Authority’s guide on Malaria.
If the patient vomits within 1 hour after have taken the medicament, a new tablet has to be comsumed.

name: Doxycyklin.
dosage:
Dosis voksne og børn over 12 år: ½ tablet dagligt.
Indtages med et glas vand eller et let måltid uden mælkeprodukter.
Behandlingen udstrækkes fra 1 dag før ankomst til 4 uger efter afrejse fra malariaområdet.
sideEffects: Kvalme, vaginal svamp og toksiske hudreaktioner i forbindelse med sollys.
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato (Vibradox®, Sandoz).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Må ikke anvendes af gravide eller ammende eller af børn under 12 år.
Direkte sollys bør undgås. Interaktion med mange lægemidler.

name: Doxycykline.
dosage:
Dose, adult and children over the age of 12 or 45 kg: ½ tablet daily.
To be taken with a glass of water or a light meal without any milk products.
The prevention starts1 day before arrival and lasts until 4 weeks after departure from the malaria area.
sideEffects: Nausea, vaginal candidiasis, toxic skin reaction in connection with sunlight.
validity: 3 years from the date of production (vibradox®, Sandoz)
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical
Not to be used by pregnant or breast-feeding woman or children below the age of 12.
Direct sunlight should be avoided. Interaction with many other medicines.

name: Atovaquon/Proguanil (Malarone®).
dosage:
Tabletterne skal indtages med fedtholdigt mad (mælk/smør).
Dosis voksne: 4 tabletter x 1 dagligt i 3 dage.
effect: Hæmmer celledelingen af malariaparasiten i leveren.
sideEffects: Hovedpine, mavekneb, kvalme, opkastning, appetitløshed, diaré, hoste og allergisk hududslet.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Malarone®, GlaxoSmithKline Pharma A/S).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical uanset resultatet af malariatesten.
Ved opkastning inden én time efter indtagelse af medikamentet indtages ny tablet.
Patientens almen tilstand skal bedres og temperaturen blive normal efter 2 – 3 dages behandling. I modsat fald kan man i samråd med Radio Medical fortsætte med 8.3

name: Atovaquone/Proguanil (Malarone®)
dosage: The tablets must be taken with fatty food (milk/butter). Dose, adults: 4 tablets daily for 3 days.
effect: Inhibits the proliferation of the malaria parasite in the liver.
sideEffects: Headache, slight stomach pains, nausea, vomiting, loss of appetite, diarrhoea, and coughing.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Malarone®, GlaxoSmithKline Pharma A/S).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
If the patient vomits within 1 hour after having taken the medicament, the treatment is repeated.
The patient should be recovering after 2-3 days’ treatment. If this is not the case, proceed with 8.3 after having consulted Radio Medical.

name: Quinin.
dosage: 10 mg per kg legemsvægt x 3 dagligt i 7 dage
sideEffects: Øresusen, synsforstyrrelser, kvalme, opkastning og svimmelhed ses hyppigt.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Kinin “DAK”, Nycomed Danmark).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical uanset resultatet af malariatesten.
Ved opkastning inden én time efter indtagelse af medikamentet gentages behandlingen.
Patientens almen tilstand skal bedres og temperaturen blive normal efter 2–3 dages behandling.

name: Quinine.
dosage: 10 mg per kg bodyweight three times daily for 7 days.
effect: Inhibits the proliferation of the malaria parasite
sideEffects: Buzzing in the ears, visual disturbances, nausea, vomiting, and dizziness are often seen.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Kinin “DAK”, Nycomed Denmark).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical regardless of the result of the malaria test. 
If the patient vomits within 1 hour after having taken the medicament, the treatment is repeated.
The patient should be recovering and the temperature become normal after 2-3 day´s treatment.

name: Artemether and lumefantrine
dosage:
Efter kontakt med Radio Medical Danmark. 
Start omgående med 4 tbl.  
Derefter:
4 tabl 8 timer efter første dosis
4 tabl 24 timer efter første dosis.
4 tbl. 36 timer efter første dosis.
4 tbl. 48 timer efter første dosis.
4 tbl. 60 timer efter første dosis.
sideEffects: Mave-Tarm gener, hudkløe, hududslæt, hovedpine og svimmelhed.
validity: 2 år  fra produktionsdato (Riamet®, Novatis)
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical, uanset resultatet af malariatest.

name: Artemether and lumefantrine
dosage:
Consult Radio Medical Danmark
4 tablets as soon as possible
Then:
4 tablets 8 hours later, then
4 tablets 24 hours after the first dose, then
4 tablets 36 hours after the first dose, then
4 tablets 48 hours after the first dose and then
4 tablets 60 hours after the first dose.
sideEffects: Gastrointestinal disorders, itchy skin, skin rash, headache and dizziness.
validity: 2 years from production date ( Riamet®, Novatis)
remarks: Consult Radio Medical, regardless of the result of the malaria test.

name: Glycerylnitrat
dosage: Medikamentet pustes ind under tungen eller på kindens inderside.1 pust så hurtigt som muligt efter smerters opståen. Kan gentages 1 gang. Hvis smerterne ikke fortager sig, suppleres med morfin (3.4).
effect: Udvider blodkar. Virker inden 1 minut. Virkningsvarighed: 10 - 30 minutter.
sideEffects: Ansigtsrødme, hovedpine og kvalme. Kan sænke blodtrykket lidt.
validity: 2 år fra produktionsdato (Glytrin®, Meda).
storage: Almindelig temperatur. Beskyttes mod frost, direkte varme og sollys.
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Overvåg blodtrykket, som helst ikke må komme under 90 mm Hg systolisk.
Må ikke anvendes i nærheden af åben ild eller gløder.

name: Glyceryl trinitrate.
dosage:
The medicament is sprayed under the tongue or at the inner side of the cheek.
1 spray as soon as possible after the pain has occurred. May be repeated once.
If the pain does not decrease, supplement with morphine (3.4).
effect: Expands the blood vessels. Takes effect within 1 minute. Effective for 10-30 minutes.
sideEffects:
Blushing, headache, and nausea.
May cause a minor fall in blood pressure.
validity: 2 years from the date of production (Glytrin®, Meda).
storage: Not to be stored above 25°C. Protect from frost, direct heat and sunlight.
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Control the blood pressure, which should not be below 90 mm Hg systolic.
Not to be used close to open fire or embers.

name: Acetylsalicylsyre.
dosage:
Akut: 300 mg som tygges
Vedligehold: 75 mg dagligt
sideEffects:
Øget blødningsrisiko.
Risiko for allergiske reaktioner.
Farlig dosis: 150 mg per kg legemsvægt.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Hjertemagnyl®, Nycomed Danmark).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Bør ikke gives til patienter med mavesår.

name: Acetylsalicylic acid.
dosage:
Acute: 300 mg has to be chewed
Hereafter: 75 mg, daily
sideEffects: Increased risk of bleeding. Risk of allergic reactions.Dangerous dose: 150 mg per kg
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Hjertemagnyl®, Nycomed Denmark).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Not to be given to ulcer patients.

name: Furosemid.
dosage:
Vand i lungerne: 40 - 120 mg. Kan gentages efter 30 minutter.
Blodtryksforhøjelse: 40 - 80 mgx1-3 dagligt. (maksimalt 1500 mg/døgn).
effect:
Tvinger væske ud af blodbanen via nyrerne til urinblæren, hvorefter væske suges fra lungerne (og andet væv). . Virker 1/2  time efter indtagelse.
Maksimumeffekt efter 2 timer. Virkningsvarighed:3-6 timer.
sideEffects: Ingen relevante.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Furix®, Nycomed Danmark).
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Furosemide.
dosage: Lungedema: 40-120 mg. May be repeated after 30 minutes High blood pressure: 40-80 mg once to three times daily (maximum 1500 mg/day).
effect: Extracts fluids from the blood vessel via the kidneys to the urinary bladder, after which the fluid is absorbed from the lungs (and other tissue). Takes effect after 1/2 hour. Maximum effect after 2 hours. Effective for 3-6 hours.
sideEffects: None relevant.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Furix®, Nycomed Denmark).
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Furosemid.
dosage: Individuelt.  40 - 120 mg. Kan gentages efter 30 minutter.
form: Injektionsvæske 10 mg/ml. Ampuller à 4 ml til intramuskulær eller intravenøs injektion.
effect:
Tvinger væske ud af blodbanen via nyrerne til urinblæren, hvorefter væske suges fra lungerne (og andet væv). 
Virker inden for 5 minutter efter IV. injektion. Maksimumeffekt inden 30 minutter.
sideEffects: Ingen relevante.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Furix®, Nycomed Danmark).
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Furosemide.
dosage: Dependent on the patient. 40-120 mg. May be repeated after 30 minutes.
form: Injection liquid 10 mg/ml. Ampoules of 4 ml for intramuscular or intravenous injection.
effect: Extracts fluids from the blood vessel via the kidneys to the urinary bladder, after which the fluid is absorbed from the lungs (and other tissue). Takes effect 5 minutes after I.V injection. Maximum effect within 30 minutes.
sideEffects: No relevant.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Furix®, Nycomed Denmark).
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Atenolol.
dosage:
Forhøjet blodtryk:
Voksne. 50-100 mg i døgnet. Hjertekrampe og hjerterytmeforstyrrelser:
Sædvanligvis 50 mg 1 gang i døgnet stigende til 100 mg i døgnet.
Forebyggelse efter blodprop i hjertet:
50-100 mg 1 gang i døgnet under kontrol af puls og blodtryk.
sideEffects: Træthed, kvalme, opkastning, diarré, forstoppelse. Langsom puls, sammentrækning af blodkarrene, lavt blodtryk.Muskelsvaghed. Øget svedtendens.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato. (Atenolol, Orifarm Generics A/S)
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Bør ikke anvendes til patienter med astma, kroniske obstruktiv lungesygdom  (KOL) og ved svær regulerbar sukkersyge.

name: Atenolol
dosage:
High blood pressure: Adults: 50- 100 mg daily
Angina pectoris and heart rhythm disturbances:
Usually 50 mg once a day, increasing to 100 mg daily. Prevention after coronary thrombosis:
50-100 mg once a day under the control of heart rate and blood pressure.
sideEffects: Fatigue, nausea, vomiting, diarrhoea, constipation, low pulse, low blood pressure, contraction of blood vessels, muscle weakness, increased sweating.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Atenolol, Orifarm Generics A/S)
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Should not be used in patients with asthma, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COLD)
Should not be used in patients with diabetes, which is hard to adjust.

name: Tinzaparin
dosage: Efter ordination af Radio Medical Danmark
sideEffects: Blødningstendens, blodmangel, irritation ved indstiksstedet, Hæmatomer
validity: 3 år fra produktions dato (Innohep, Paranova, Danmark)
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical Danmark

name: Tinzaparine
dosage: After prescription from Radio Medical Danmark
sideEffects: Bleeding tendency, anemia, injection site irritation, Hematomas.
validity: 3 years fron procutiondate (Innohep, Paranova, Danmark)
remarks: Consult Radio Medical Danmark

name: Miconazol.
dosage: Den angrebne hud pudres 2 gange dagligt. Behandlingen bør fortsætte 1 uge efter symptomfrihed.
sideEffects: Ingen relevante.
validity: 2 år fra produktionsdato (Brentan®, McNeil Denmark ApS).
remarks: Bør ikke anvendes i åbne sår, i hårbund, skæg eller negle.

name: Miconazole.
dosage:
Apply to the skin twice daily
The treatment should be continued for a week after the symptoms have disappeared.
effect: Restricts fungus growth in the skin.
sideEffects: No relevant ones.
validity: 2 years from the date of production (Brentan®, McNeil Denmark ApS).
remarks: Should not be used in open wounds, on scalps, beards, or nails.

name: Sølvsulfadiazin.
dosage: Påføres i et3-5 mm tykt lag 1 gang per døgn.
sideEffects: Hudirritation.
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato (Flamazine®, Smith & Nephew). Tuber bør kasseres 14 dage efter åbning.
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Se anvisningen i Søfartsstyrelsens Lægebog.

name: Silver sulfadiazine.
dosage: Apply a thin layer of 3-5 mm to the skin once a day.
effect: Prevents skin infections in connection with burns.
sideEffects: Skin irritation.
validity: 3 years from the date of production (Flamazine®, Smith & Nephew) Tubes should be discarded 14 days after opening.
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
See the instructions given in the Danish Maritime Authority’s Medical Manual.

name: Permethrin.
dosage:
Påsmøres den rene og tørre hud.
Cremen skal siddei 8- 12 timer før den afvaskes. Behandlingen gentages efter 8 dage.
effect: Gift, der dræber lus, fnatmider og deres æg.
sideEffects: Kløe og rødme af huden.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Nix®, ACO Hud Nordic AB).
remarks: Se instruktionen i indlægsseddel.

name: Permethrin.
dosage:
Apply to clean, dry skin.
The cream should not be washed off until after 8-12 hours. The treatment is repeated after 8 days.
effect: Poison that kills lice, scab mites, and their eggs.
sideEffects: Itching and skin blushing.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Nix®, ACO Hud Nordic AB).
remarks: See package leaflet.

name: Permethrin.
dosage:
Indgnides i det renvaskede, frotterede og fugtige hår og hårbund.
Shampoen skal sidde i 10 minutter før den skylles ud. Døde lus og æg fjernes med tættekam, mens håret endnu er vådt. Behandlingen gentages efter 8 dage.
effect: Gift, der dræber lus, fnatmider og deres æg.
sideEffects: Kløe og rødme af huden.
validity: 2 år fra produktionsdato (Nix®, ACO Hud Nordic AB ).
remarks: Se instruktionen i indlægsseddel.

name: Permethrin.
dosage:
Apply to washed, rubbed, and wet hair and scalp.
The shampoo should not be rinsed off until after 10 minutes. Dead lice and eggs are removed with a fine comb while the hair is still wet.
The treatment is repeated after 8 days.
effect: Poison that kills lice, scab mites, and their eggs.
sideEffects: Itching and skin blushing.
validity: 2 years from the date of production (Nix®, ACO Hud Nordic AB).
remarks: See package leaflet.

name: Glukokortikoid gruppe II
dosage: Voksne: Påsmøres tyndt 1-2 gange daglig.
effect: Modvirker betændelsestilstande, der er fremkaldt af allergiske og toksiske årsager. Virker kløestillende og smertestillende.
sideEffects: Hudkløe, brændende fornemmelse i huden, tynd hud, kontakteksem.
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato. (Locoid, Astellas Pharma A/S)
storage: Almindelig temperatur.Må ikke opbevares koldt eller fryses.
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical 
Må ikke anvendes i åbne sår.

name: Glucocorticoid group II
dosage:
Adults:
Apply a thin layer to the skin 1-2 times daily
effect: Eases inflammations caused by allergic or toxic agents. Antiprurtic and analgesic.
sideEffects: Prurtic, burning sensation in the skin, thin skin, contact dermatitis
validity: 3 years from the date of production (Locoid, Astellas Pharma A/S)
storage: Normal temperature.Do not refrigerate or freeze
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Do not use in open wounds.

name: Klorhexidin/ethanol.
remarks:
Må ikke anvendes i sår, i øjne eller på slimhinder. Indeholder 85 % alkohol.
Se Søfartsstyrelsens Lægebog.
Alternativt indkøbes Chlorhexidin 0,5 % og Ethanol minimum 70 %, i 2 seperate flasker.
Først anvendes Klorhexidin, derefter Ethanol.

name: Chlorhexidine/ethanol.
remarks:
Not be used in wounds, in eyes, or on mucous membranes. Contains 85% alcohol.
See the Danish Maritime Authority’s Medical Manual. Alternatively, Chlorhexidine 0.5%  and ethanol with a minimum of 70% may be purchased in  2 separate bottles. Use chlorhexidine first and then ethanol

name: Klorhexidin.
remarks:
Kan anvendes i forurenede sår, der er utilgængelig for normal sårrensning.
Se Søfartsstyrelsens Lægebog.

name: Lactulose (disakkarid af galaktose og fruktose).
dosage: 15 - 30 ml dagligt.
form: Saft med 667 mg laktulose per ml.
effect:
Den afførende virkning kan forventes efter2-3 dages behandling.
Binder væske i tarmen, hvorved afføringen blødgøres. Fremmer den normale tarmflora.
Øger tarmenes bevægelser.
sideEffects: Luftudvikling i tarmsystemet. Oppustethed.
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato (Favolax, Orion Corporation).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Undersøg om tilstanden skyldes en sygdom med feber eller mangel på væske FØR anvendelsen.
30 - 50 ml dagligt kan øge insulinbehovet ved diabetikere.

name: Lactulose (disaccaride of galactose and fructose).
dosage: 15-30 ml daily
form: Juice with 667 mg lactulose per ml.
effect:
The laxative effect may be expected after 2-3 day`s treatment.
Binds liquids in the intestines so that faeces are softened. Furthers normal intestinal flora.
Increases the motility of the intestines.
sideEffects: Intestinal gas. Bloatedness.
validity: 3 years from the date of production (Favolax Orion Corporation).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Examine whether the state has been caused by an illness accompanied by fever or a lack of liquids BEFORE use.
30-50 ml a day may increase the need for insulin in diabetic patients.

name: Loperamid.
dosage:
Start: 2 tabletter. Pause 1 time.
Derpå 1 tablet for hver uformet afføring. Maksimum: 8 tabletter (16 mg) per døgn.
sideEffects: Mundtørhed, kvalme, mavesmerter. Risiko for tarmstop.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Imodium®, McNeil).
remarks:
Undersøg om den syge har feber.
Bør kun anvendes til børn efter Radio Medicals anvisninger. Bør kun anvendes kortvarigt ved akut diaré hos i øvrigt upåvirkede personer.

name: Loperamide.
dosage:
Start: 2 tablets. Wait for 1 hour.
1 tablet for every loose stool. Maximum: 8 tablets (16 mg) daily
effect: Restricts the motility of the intestines.
sideEffects: Dry mouth, nausea, slight stomach pains. Risk of intestinal stop.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Imodium®, McNeil).
remarks:
Examine whether the patient has a fever.
Should only be given to children on directions given by Radio Medical.
Use only for a short period of time in case of acute diarrhoea on  patients not otherwise affected.

name: Glucose/kaliumklorid/magnesiumsulfat/natriumcitrat/natriumklorid.
dosage:
1 pulver opløses i 1 liter kogt, afkølet vand. Basisbehov: 21/2  liter per døgn.
For hver grad over 37°C gives yderligere 300 ml per døgn. For hver diarré gives yderligere 200 ml per døgn.
sideEffects: Ingen.
validity: 2 år fra produktionsdato (Revolyt, Gunnar Kjems APS).
storage: Almindelig temperatur. Færdigblandet opløsning opbevares i køleskab.
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Glucose/potassium/magnesium/sodium citrate/sodium.
dosage:
1 powder is dissolved in 1 litre of boiled, cooled water. Basic need: 2.5 litre daily.
For every degree above 37°C, the patient is given another 300 ml daily. For every instance of diarrhoea, the patient is given another 200 ml daily.
sideEffects: None.
validity: 2 years from the date of production (Revolyt®, Gunnar Kjems APS).
storage: Normal temperature. The mixed dissolution should be stored in a cold place.
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Omeprazol
dosage: Mavesår: 20 – 40 mg dagligt. Langtidsbehandling: 10 – 20 mg dagligt.
sideEffects: Kvalme, opkastning, diarré, forstoppelse, luft i tarmen. Hovedpine, træthed, svimmelhed, søvnforstyrrelser.
validity: 4 år fra produktionsdato. (Omeprazol, Copyfarm A/S)
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Kan eventuelt kombineres med antibiotika.

name: Omeprazol
dosage:
Stomach ulcer: 20-40 mg daily 
Long term treatment: 10-20 mg daily
sideEffects: Nausea, vomiting, diarrhoea, constipation, flatulence, headache, fatique, dizziness, sleep disturbances.
validity: 4 years from the date of production (Omeprazol, Copyfarm A/S)
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Can be combined with antibiotics.

name: Antacida
dosage:
Jf. indlægsseddel i præparatet
Efter ordination af Radio Medical
sideEffects: Forstoppelse, diarré
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato ( Alminox®, Nycomed Danmark )
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Antacid
dosage: See patients information leaflet. Prescription from Radio Medical.
sideEffects: Constipation, diarrhoea
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Alminox®, Nycomed Danmark)
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Antihæmoride creme (skal indeholde glucokortikoid og smertestillende middel)
dosage: Voksne: Smøres på 2-3 gange daglig, samt efter afføring.
effect: Lindring af smerter, hævelse, brændende fornemmelse og kløe i forbindelse med hæmoroider og analrifter.
sideEffects: Anal slimhindeatrofi
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato. (Proctosedyl, 2care4 ApS)
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Anti haemorrhoid ointment (Must contain glucocorticoid and analgesic )
dosage: Apply 2-3 times daily and after defecation.
effect: Relief of pain, swellingand burning sensation / itching associated with haemorrhoids, anal lacerations.
sideEffects: Thin skin in the anus.
validity: 3 years from the date of production (Proctosedyl, 2care4 ApS).
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Domperidon
dosage: 10 mg max 3 gange dagligt.
effect:
Øger mavens og tarmenes bevægelser, hvilket medfører en hurtigere tømning.
Påvirker brækcenteret, hvilket medfører at kvalme og opkastninger aftager.
sideEffects: Mundtørhed, døsighed, tristhed, uro og rastløshed.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Motilium®, Janssen -Cilag).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Bør ikke anvendes til børn < 35 kg
Bør kun anvendes kortvarigt (op til 1 uge).

name: Domperidone
dosage: 10 mg maximum three times daily
effect:
Increases the motility of the stomach and the intestines causing a faster emptying.
Affects the vomiting centre so that the nausea and vomiting decrease.
sideEffects: Dry mouth, drowsiness, sadness, and restlessness.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Motilium®  Janssen-Cilag).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Not to be given to children <35 kg.
Only for short use (1 week)

name: Ondansetron
dosage: Efter ordination fra Radio Medical Danmark
sideEffects: Hovedpine, forstoppelse, Rødme og varmefølelse
validity: 5 år fra produktions dato ( Aurobindo Pharma)
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical Danmark

name: Ondansetron
dosage: By prescription from Radio Medical Danmark
sideEffects: Headache, Constipation, Redness and warm feeling
validity: 5 years from production date ( Aurobindo Pharma)
remarks: Consult Radio Medical Danmark

name: Movicol®
dosage: Efter ordination fra Radio Medical Danmark
effect: Binder væske i tarmen, hvorved afføringen blødgøres
sideEffects: Mavesmerter, Anal irritation, Diarré, Flatulens, Kvalme, Meteorisme, Opkastning.
validity: 3 år fra produktions dato ( Norgine BV)
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical

name: Movicol®
dosage: By prescripstion from Radio Medical Danmark
effect: Binds fluid in the intestine, thereby softening the stools
sideEffects: Abdominal pain, Anal irritation, Diarrhea, Flatulence, Nausea, Meteorism, Vomiting.
validity: 3 years from production date (Norgine BV)
remarks: Consult Radio Medical

name: Cinchocain.
dosage: 1 (en) cm salve bag nederste øjenlåg. Kan gentages efter et par minutter.
groupName: 3 Øjne og øre / Eyes and ears
sideEffects: Risiko for maskering af skader eller sygdomme i øjet. Forsinket sårheling.
validity: 2 år fra produktionsdato (Cincain “Optha”, Ophta).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Kan ikke anvendes sammen med kontaktlinser.

name: Cinchocaine.
dosage: Apply 1 cm of ointment behind the lower eyelid. May be repeated after a couple of minutes.
groupName: 3 Øjne og øre / Eyes and ears
sideEffects: Risk of masking  injuries or diseases in the eye. Delayed healing of wounds.
validity: 2 years from the date of production (Cinchaine “Optha”, Ophta).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Not to be used when wearing contact lenses.

name: Dexamethason.
dosage:
Øjet:1-2 dråber bag nederste øjenlåg hver time indtil bedring. Herefter 1 dråbe 4-6 gange per døgn.
Øret: Øregangen renses, tørres og pakkes med gaze, der er gennemvædet med dexamethason. Gazen holdes fugtig med opløsningen og fjernes efter 24 timer. Behandlingen gentages så længe Radio Medical skønner det nødvendig.
effect: Standser den allergiske eller inflammatoriske proces.
groupName: 3 Øjne og øre / Eyes and ears
sideEffects: Allergi. Risiko for maskering af infektioner, skader eller sygdomme i øjet.
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato (Maxidex®, S.A. Alcon-couvreur N.V.).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Kan ikke anvendes sammen med kontaktlinser.

name: Dexamethasone.
dosage:
The eye: 1-2 drops behind the lower eyelid every hour until improvement. Subsequently, 1 drop four-six times daily
The ear: The auditory canal is cleansed and dried, and gauze soaked in dexamethasone is applied. The gauze is kept humid with the dissolution and removed after 24 hours. The treatment is repeated for as long as found necessary by Radio Medical.
effect: Stops the allergic or inflammatory process.
groupName: 3 Øjne og øre / Eyes and ears
sideEffects: Allergy. Risk of masking of infections, injuries, or diseases in the eye.
validity: 3 years from the date of production (Maxidex®, Singad Pharma ApS).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Not to be used when wearing contact lenses.

name: Pilocarpin.
dosage: Hyppig drypning bag nederste øjenlåg efter ordination fra Radio Medical.
effect: Nedsætter trykket i det indre øje.
groupName: 3 Øjne og øre / Eyes and ears
sideEffects: Sammentrækning i pupillens lukkemuskel (“knappenålspupil”) og hovedpine.
validity: 1½ år fra produktionsdato (Pilocarpin “ophta”®,  Ophtha A/S) Må højst anvendes 1 måned efter åbning.
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Kan ikke anvendes sammen med kontaktlinser.

name: Pilocarpine.
dosage: Frequent drops behind the lower eyelid after prescribtion from Radio Medical.
groupName: 3 Øjne og øre / Eyes and ears
sideEffects: Spasms of the sphincter of the pupil (“pin-hole pupil”) and headache.
validity:
1½ years from the date of production (Pilocarpin “ophtha”®, Ophtha A/S).
To be use within 1 month, from opening the package.
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Not to be used when wearing contact lenses.

name: Aciclovir.
dosage:
Øjet: 1 cm salve bag nederste øjenlåg 5 gange dagligt indtil 3 døgn efter symptomfrihed.
Kan tillige anvendes ved herpesangreb på læberne.
groupName: 3 Øjne og øre / Eyes and ears
sideEffects: Øjenirritation.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Zovir®, GlaxoSmithKline Pharma A/S).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Kan ikke anvendes sammen med kontaktlinser.

name: Acyclovir.
dosage:
The eye: Apply ointment in a layer of 1 cm behind the lower eyelid five times a day until 3 days after the patient is free of symptoms.
May also be used in case of herpes infections of the lips.
groupName: 3 Øjne og øre / Eyes and ears
sideEffects: Irritation of the eye.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Zovir®, GlaxoSmithKline Pharma A/S).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Not to be used when wearing contact lenses.

name: Fusidin
dosage: 1 dråbe x 2 dagligt
groupName: 3 Øjne og øre / Eyes and ears
sideEffects: Øjenirritation, øjenkløe og rødme
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato, (Fucithalmic, EuroPharma DK)
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Kan ikke anvendes sammen med kontaktlinser.

name: Fusidin
dosage: 1 drop twice daily
groupName: 3 Øjne og øre / Eyes and ears
sideEffects: Irritation of the eye, eye itching and blushing.
validity: 3 years from the date of production (Fucithalmic, EuroPharma DK)
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Not to be used in connection with contact lenses.

name: Medium til at blødgøre ørevoks
dosage:
10-20 dråber dryppes i øret. Et stykke vat anbringes i øret og personen lejres således at dråberne forbliver i øret.
Efter 20 -50 min. skylles øret med lunkent vand (37°C).
groupName: 3 Øjne og øre / Eyes and ears
sideEffects: Se indlæggelsesseddel
validity: Se produktet.(Removax®)
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical
Må ikke anvendes hvis der er hul i trommehinden. Må ikke anvendes ved betændelse eller smerter i øret og ved allergi overfor indholdsstofferne.

name: Medium to soften earwax
dosage: 10-20 drops in the ear. A piece of cotton wool is placed in the ear and the person is placed, so that the droplets remain in the ear. After 20-50 min rinse the ear with warm water (37°C).
groupName: 3 Øjne og øre / Eyes and ears
sideEffects: Read the patient information leaflet
validity: See expire date on the product (Remowax ®)
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Do not use if there is a hole in the eardrum. Not for use by inflammation or pain in the ear and allergy to the ingredients.

name: Tropicamid
dosage: Akut: 1-2 dråber 3 gange dagligt.
groupName: 3 Øjne og øre / Eyes and ears
sideEffects: Feber, forstoppelse, hjertebanken, hallucinationer, excitation, konfusion, ansigtsrødme, akkomodationsbesvær, øjenirritation, fotofobi.
validity: 3 år fra produktionsdato,( Mydriacyl®  , S.A. Alcon-couvreur N.V)
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical.

name: Tropicamide
dosage: Akut: 1-2 drops 3 times a day.
groupName: 3 Øjne og øre / Eyes and ears
sideEffects: Fever, constipation, palpitations, hallucinations, excitation, comfusion, flushing, difficulties with accommodation, eye irritation, photophobia
validity: 3 years from the date of production( Mydriacyl® , Alcon)
remarks: Consult Radio Medical.

name: Ciprofloxacin / Hydrocortison
dosage: 3 dråber i berørte øre 2 gange daglig
groupName: 3 Øjne og øre / Eyes and ears
sideEffects: Ørekløe, øresmerter, svimmelhed
validity: Ubrudt 2 år fra produktionsdato ( Ciflox, Novartis Healthcare A/S)
storage: Beskytte mod lys og ikke over 25 c. Må ikke opbevares i køleskab.
remarks: Søg samråd med Radio Medical Danmark

name: Ciprofloxacien / Hydrocortisone
dosage: 3 drops in affected ear twice daily
groupName: 3 Øjne og øre / Eyes and ears
sideEffects: Ear itching, earache, dizziness
validity: Unbroken 2 years from production date ( Ciflox, Novartis Healthcare A/S)
storage: Protect from light and not more than 25 c. Do not refrigerate.
remarks: Consult Radio Medical Danmark

name: Fluconazol.
dosage:
Skedesvamp: 150 mg som éngangsdosis. Hudsvamp: 150 mg per uge i 4-6 uger.
Neglesvamp: 150 mg per uge i 3 - 12 måneder (til en ny negl er dannet).
sideEffects:
Allergi.
I sjældne tilfælde alvorlig leverforgiftning. Fluconazol påvirker virkningen af adskillige andre medikamenter, herunder bl.a. blodfortyndende og beroligende midler, samt p-piller.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Fluconazol “KRKA”, KRKA Sverige AB).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical. 
Bør ikke anvendes til gravide.

name: Fluconazole.
dosage:
Vaginal fungus: 150 mg as a single dose. Skin fungus: 150 mg a week for 4-6 weeks.
Nail fungus: 150 mg a week for 3-12 months (until a new nail has been formed).
sideEffects:
Allergy.
In rare cases, serious liver poisoning.
Fluconazole affects the effect of several other medicaments, including, inter alia, blood-thinning substances, sedatives, and birth control pills.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Fluconazol “KRKA”, KRKA Sverige AB).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Not to be used by pregnant women.

name: Methylergometrin.
dosage:
Efter abort eller fødsel:
0,125 - 0,250 mg 3 gange dagligt.
sideEffects:
Overfølsomhed.
Hovedpine, mavesmerter, forhøjet blodtryk, hududslet.
validity: 5 år fra produktionsdato (Methergin®, Novartis).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Må ikke anvendes til gravide med blødninger.

name: Methylergometrine.
dosage:
After giving birth or miscarriage:
0.125-0.250 mg three times daily
sideEffects: Allergy. Headache, stomach ache, high blood pressure, rash.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Methergine®, Novartis).
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
Not to be used by pregnant women who are bleeding.

name: Dextromethorphan
dosage: 15-30 mg. 3-4 gange daglig
groupName: 5 Astma og forkølelse / Astma and common cold
sideEffects: 0,1 – 1 % af behandlede, får ufrivillige muskelsammentrækning, døsighed, svimmelhed, hallucinationer, mani.
validity: 5 år fra produktions dato (Dexofan® Nycomed)
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical
Bør ikke anvendes til børn under 6 år
Bør ikke anvendes ved samtidig behandling med 7.6 og 7.7 Metronidazol.
Bør ikke anvendes ved samtidig behandling med Disulfiram (Antabus®)

name: Dextromethorphan
dosage: 15 – 30 mg. 3-4 times a day
groupName: 5 Astma og forkølelse / Astma and common cold
sideEffects: 0,1 to 1% of treated get unvoluntary muscle contraction, drowsiness, dizziness, hallucinations and mania.
validity: 5 years from the date of production (Dexofan® Nycomed)
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical
Should not be used under the age of 6 years
Should not be used during concomitant treatment with 7.6 or 7.7 Metronidazole.
Should not be used during concomitant treatment with disulfiram (Antabuse ®)

name: Terbutalin.
dosage: 1 dosis efter behov. Højst 6 gange dagligt.
form: Pulver i turbuhaler. 0,5 mg per dosis.
effect: Løsner kramper i den glatte muskulatur i luftvejene. Afslapper livmoderens muskulatur.
groupName: 5 Astma og forkølelse / Astma and common cold
sideEffects: Muskelrystelser og hurtig puls. Nældefeber. Rødt hududslet.
validity: 2 år fra produktionsdato (Bricanyl® Turbuhaler, AstraZeneca).
remarks:
Søg samråd med Radio Medical.
Hvis virkningen udebliver forsøges med 15.3.
Hvis vejrtrækningen bedres fortsæt med 15.6 eller 4.3.

name: Terbutaline.
dosage: 1 dose as required. Maximum six times daily
effect:
Loosens convulsions in the smooth musculature in the respiratory tract.
Relaxes the musculature of the uterus.
groupName: 5 Astma og forkølelse / Astma and common cold
sideEffects: Muscle contractions and rapid pulse. Urticaria. Red rash.
validity: 2 years from the date of production (Bricanyl®, Turbuhaler, AstraZeneca).
storage: Normal temperature. To be stored in a dry place.
remarks:
Consult Radio Medical.
If there is no effect, try remedy 15.3.
If respiration is improved, continue with remedy 15.6 or 4.3.

name: Budesonid.
dosage: 1 dosis efter behov. Højst 8 gange per døgn.
form: Pulver i turbuhaler. 200 µg per dosis.
effect: Fjerner inflammatorisk ødem og hævelse i luftvejene.
groupName: 5 Astma og forkølelse / Astma and common cold
sideEffects: Overfølsomhedsreaktioner.
